name: FlyingBat-MG0
description:
A Flappy-Bird type game where the movement is unique, takes a lil'bit time to learn. Following the limitation - Enemies which look exactly like the Player attack and decrease Health.  (health is shown as a white bar in the top of the frame) (and also this my first published-finished game :D)

Controls: Keyboard - Arrow keys - Left, Right and Spacebar. Controller can be used 'while playing'. - Button A and Left Joystick.

Objective: Stay alive for as long as possible and 'try to get out of the Dark Box and fall into the void'.

*the quit button was made for an executable, and does't work in WebGL
